reversed.love: In love, the opposite position, the pressure of the family, the insecurity, or the material-based relationship, true devotion comes from the heart.
reversed.career: In careers, it can mean loss of inheritance or false investment, short-term interests can hurt long-term peace.
reversed.money: Financially, it could be wasteful, bad investment or inheritance dispute.
reversed.spiritual: Spiritually, it reminds you of the need to make peace with past generations, transform your family energy with love.

context.mythology: The Tenth of the Talisman represents the blessing of the seed of Mother Gaia. This card is not only an individual but the energy of collective prosperity.

celtic_cross.future: Soon, a stable success and a time of family peace awaits you.
celtic_cross.hidden_influences: You have the support and protection of your ancestors, and your roots carry you.

story.title: The Tenth of the Talisman, the Blessing of the Roots
story.description: In the card, an old wise man sits with his family in the midst of plenty. In the background, the dogs represent loyalty, the charms on his belt, the legacy. This scene tells the generations of lasting peace.
story.history_message: Ten of Pentnacles was a symbol of family and community welfare in medieval sects. Wealth was viewed not only as a share of wealth but as a share of wisdom.
story.mystic_message: This card represents adapting to the family energy, honoring the wisdom of the past, the support of the ancestors.
story.cultural_message: In the modern world, the Talisman Ten represents financial stability, family ties and sustainable systems, the formula for permanence.
story.lesson: This card teaches that lasting success is not only carried out by money, but by love and devotion.

keywords.keywords_message: Talisman ten means tarot, ten of pentacles, family, heritage, abundance, stability, roots, permanence.
keywords.positive_message: Family, trust, heritage, permanence, peace, abundance.
keywords.balance_message: Focus not only on material gain, but also on spiritual heritage.
keywords.soul_message: Your roots are sacred, the light of your ancestors walks with you.

page-of-pentacles.name: The Prince of Charm ▪ Learning, Potential and New Opportunities
page-of-pentacles.short_description: The Prince of the Talisman, the desire to learn, means that new opportunities and potential become reality, small but stable steps are the basis of great achievements.

upright.general: The Prince of Talisman represents the development of learning, open minds, new beginnings, and practical skills. This card shows that an idea or project in the seed stage is beginning to grow. If you move forward with patience and discipline, lasting success awaits you.
upright.love: In love, it brings an honest, loyal, and willing approach to learning, a new relationship can be born or the current relationship can be established on a more solid basis.
upright.career: In the career, there's a new job, internship, education or financial opportunity.
upright.money: Financially, new investment ideas or gain opportunities arise. Take careful steps; the potential for growth is high.
upright.spiritual: Spiritually, you're in the process of embodimenting information, and it's time to apply what you've learned to your life.

reversed.general: The reverse charm prince represents lazyness, lack of focus or lack of opportunity, refocus your potential so you don't waste it.
reversed.love: In love, it can show inverse position, disinterest, or emotional maturity, rebalance your heart.
reversed.career: In a career, lack of motivation or carelessness can cause you to miss out on new opportunities.
reversed.money: Financially, unscheduled spending or short-term thinking can create mistakes.
reversed.spiritual: Spiritually, not applying your inner knowledge slows your growth, live what you've learned, just don't know.

context.mythology: The Prince of the Talisman carries the young energy of Hermes, relating to the power to learn, explore, and turn knowledge into action.

celtic_cross.hidden_influences: The secret effect is your desire to learn, that energy will lead you to the right path.

story.title: The Prince of Charms ▪ The First Spark of Potential
story.description: In the card, a young prince looks carefully at the talisman he holds in his hand, and this scene describes the importance of approaching ideas with faith when they are seeded, and the patience of the earth and the energy of youth represent curiosity.
story.history_message: Page of Pentnacles was a medieval symbol of apprentice and learning, seen as the first step in the wisdom that came from experience.
story.mystic_title: Spiritual Meaning: The Awakening of Potential
story.mystic_message: This card carries the energy of the student spirit. Your spirit steps into the light of knowledge, and every experience makes you wise.
story.cultural_title: Modern Comment: New Start and Application
story.cultural_message: In the modern world, this card is about self-help, education, new business opportunities or practical projects.
story.lesson: The Prince of the Talisman teaches that the power of knowledge grows when combined with action.

keywords.positive_message: Learning, discipline, innovation, discovery, opportunity, determination.
keywords.balance_message: Even if you move slowly, be patient; each small step makes sense.

knight-of-pentacles.name: Knight of the Talisman ▪ Responsibility, discipline and Loyalty
knight-of-pentacles.short_description: The Knight of the Talisman represents stable progress for credibility, discipline, and permanent success, and every step of patience is part of a great construction.

upright.general: The Knight of the Talisman represents hard-working, reliable, responsible energy, a symbol of patiently carried plans and lasting consequences, stability, greater than speed.
upright.love: In love, loyalty carries determination and a trusted partner's energy.
upright.career: In the field of careers, discipline and methodical work will lead you to success, make long-term plans and step by step.
upright.money: Financially, it's a period of careful investment, savings and responsible spending.
upright.spiritual: Spiritually, with stability and daily rituals, you're consolidate your inner strength.

reversed.general: Reverse Talisman Knight means stasis, loss of motivation, or extreme caution, and resisting change may slow you down.
reversed.love: It shows a reverse position in love, emotional stasis, or a highly routine relationship.
reversed.career: In careers, instead of moving on with the same habits, be open to innovations, the pursuit of oversecurity can prevent development.
reversed.money: Financially, it could be loss of opportunity or financial indolence, update your plans.
reversed.spiritual: Spiritually, there may be a lack of inspiration or stability.

context.mythology: The Knight of the Talisman carries the energy of the God of patience Kronos. He is a spirit who trusts in the cycles of time and knows the sanctity of labor.

celtic_cross.future: Soon, a process that you've patiently advanced will yield results.
celtic_cross.hidden_influences: The secret effect is determination and credibility, and order will bring you to peace.

story.title: Knight of the Talisman ▪ The Journey of the Slow Power
story.description: On the card, a knight rides on a black horse, with his talisman in his hand, patiently gazes upon the horizon, neither hurrys nor returns. This scene describes the power of determination and continuity.
story.history_message: Knight of Pentnacles bears the oath of medieval knights, a sense of loyalty, patience, and duty, whose every step was made with sacred intent.
story.mystic_title: Spiritual Meaning - The Healing of Stability
story.mystic_message: This card is not a teaching of speed, but depth. The spirit expands with stability. Every patient step is a surrender to the divine plan.
story.cultural_message: In the modern world, the Knight of the Talisman is a symbol of working discipline, credibility and stable progress, and consistency is the key to success.
story.lesson: Real growth is the sum of the small steps that move with patience, and the process will make you mature.

queen-of-pentacles.name: Talisman Queen ▪ Plenty, Compassion, and Safe Area
queen-of-pentacles.short_description: The Queen of the Talisman represents fertility, trust, and compassion, both physically and spiritually balancing inner healers and nutritious energy.

upright.general: The Queen of the Talisman represents a responsible, practical, loving energy that balances life, nourishes itself and its surroundings, a symbol of abundance, trust and peace.
upright.love: In love, it represents compassion, loyalty and trust, support and understanding in relationships, and it brings confidence and commitment to your partner.
upright.career: In terms of careers, responsibility and leadership are at the forefront of projects with practical and creative solutions, both productive and supportive in business.
upright.money: Financially, smart investments, budget management, and abundance energy come forward, taking the right steps to ensure financial security and stability.
upright.spiritual: In a spiritual sense, there is inner healer and protective energy, which balances its energy with meditation, connection to nature, and daily rituals.

reversed.general: The reverse amulet queen means overprotectiveness, lack of financial addiction or responsibility, losing balance can hurt both yourself and your environment.
reversed.love: The opposite position in love may show problems caused by addiction, jealousy, or indifference.
reversed.career: A reverse position in a career can cause problems with negligence or over-controlling behavior.
reversed.money: Financially, it could be wasteful or overconservative.
reversed.spiritual: In a spiritual sense, not listening to internal guidance or using energy correctly poses a risk. Rebalance yourself.

context.mythology: The Queen of the Talisman, Demeter and Gaia, are connected to the archetypes, the figure that feeds the earth, nurtures life, and distributes abundance.

celtic_cross.future: Soon, a safe and productive period begins, both financially and spiritually, with responsibility and care.
celtic_cross.hidden_influences: Secret effects are the energy of compassion and stability, and following internal guidance is an advantage.

story.title: The Queen of the Talisman ▪ The Story of Blessings and Compassion
story.description: On the card, the queen holds a talisman in the middle of nature, surrounded by flowers and fruits, spreading trust and abundance, feeding herself and those around her, silent power and compassion are her instruments.
story.history_message: Queen of Pentnacles is portrayed in medieval and Renaissance tarots as a compassionate protector of the land and of nature, symbolizing blessing and trust.
story.mystic_message: Spiritually, the Queen of the Talisman teaches us to act in balance and compassion, and approach both you and others with responsibility and love.
story.cultural_message: In the modern world, the Queen of Talisman is associated with financial intelligence, creating safe space and supporting leadership, providing both material and spiritual abundance.
story.lesson: Learn to balance life with compassion, responsibility, and stability - abundance, patience, and carefulness.

keywords.soul_message: Use your inner healer energy, spread abundance and compassion into your life.

king-of-pentacles.name: Talisman King ▪ Plenty, Leadership and Responsibility
king-of-pentacles.short_description: The amulet king represents the energy of financial security, leadership, and responsibility. He manages his life safely, efficiently, and balancedly; he provides stability for himself and his environment.

upright.general: The King of Talisman represents a disciplined, reliable, successful figure, providing financial and spiritual security, strengthening both himself and his environment with strategic and practical approach. Leadership, stability and responsibility are his basic attributes.
upright.love: In love, it represents trust, loyalty, and long-term commitment, taking responsibility for relationships, giving support and trust to your partner, a long-term and solid bond.
upright.career: In the career, strategy, management and professional leadership are a front-runner, successful projects provide sound planning and financial assurances, a reliable and productive figure in the business environment.
upright.money: Financially, he invests in intelligence and experience, plans and careful steps to achieve abundance and trust, and financial stability and resource management is in the forefront.
upright.spiritual: In a spiritual sense, there is inner healer and protective energy that guides both itself and others through balance, discipline and conscious choices.

reversed.general: The reverse Talisman king means financial or emotional addiction, overcontrolling behavior or lack of responsibility, and lack of planning and discipline can be a risk.
reversed.love: In love, it can be reversed position, lack of trust, jealousy, or irresponsible behavior, and it's important to restore open communication and balance.
reversed.career: The reverse position in the career indicates loss of motivation with extreme authority, hierarchy, or financial concerns.
reversed.money: Financially, it can be wasteful, bad management or risky investments, and it has to be planned and conscious.
reversed.spiritual: In a spiritual sense, it's a risk to not be able to use your own power properly or to avoid responsibility.

context.mythology: The Talisman King, Pluto, and Demeter, are related to archetypes, representing power, fertility, and leadership, representing trust in material and spiritual areas.

celtic_cross.future: Soon, a solid period begins in financial and professional areas, with discipline and strategy, success and security.
celtic_cross.hidden_influences: Secret effects are the energy of security from leadership and experience, which gives us an advantage to follow internal guidance.

1.answer: Inverse position, excessive control, lack of responsibility, or financial risk, restore balance.

2.answer: Financial security is strong in situations that require leadership, responsibility and strategy.

ace-of-cups.name: Ace of Hearts ▪ New Emotional Beginnings
ace-of-cups.short_description: The Ace of Hearts represents a fresh beginning for emotional renewal, love and spiritual awareness, a time when the heart opens and emotions are concentrated.

upright.general: The Ace of Hearts brings new emotional experiences, new inner peace and loving beginnings, listen to your heart and express your feelings, and this card is an invitation to spiritual connection and creative energy.
upright.love: In love, the Ace of Hearts means new relationships, romantic proposals, or emotional renewal in the current relationship.
upright.career: In a career, emotional satisfaction and harmony are at the forefront, relationships with co-workers get stronger, you get inspired for creative projects.
upright.money: In financial matters, emotionally satisfying and compatible opportunities come to light, decisions intuitively and win through intimate relationships.
upright.spiritual: Spiritually, the Ace of Hearts is an ideal time for internal awareness, meditation and spiritual journeys.

reversed.general: Inverse Ace of Cups, emotional blockages, lack of relationships, lack of love, delay expressing your feelings, allow internal regeneration.
reversed.love: The opposite position in love, lack of communication, emotional instability, or the effects of old injuries can cause problems in the relationship.
reversed.career: There may be a lack of emotional motivation or dissonance in business relationships in the career, so be careful and balanced.
reversed.money: In financial matters, there is a risk of not seeing opportunities or of making bad decisions with emotional influences.
reversed.spiritual: Psychologically, it could be emotional blockages or internal shutdown, meditate to enhance your inner awareness.

context.mythology: The Ace of Hearts represents the energy of the water element, emotional regeneration and spiritual expansion, and in ancient mythology, love is associated with fresh beginnings in stories about compassion and intuition.

celtic_cross.future: In the future, you may face new emotional experiences and intimate relationships, and when your heart is open, opportunities find you.
celtic_cross.hidden_influences: It's about hidden influences, intuition, past experiences, and spiritual preparation, which supports new beginnings.

story.title: The Ace of Hearts (E.G.) Reopening Heart
story.description: In the card, a hand extends a cup from the sky; water flows from the cup, and the lotus flowers bloom around it. This represents emotional and spiritual regeneration, the opening of the heart, and love. It is an invitation for new relationships and emotional awareness.
story.history_message: The Ace of Hearts was regarded as the beginning card of Tarot's minor background as a symbol of emotional and spiritual potential. In the Middle Ages and Renaissance sheets, spiritual renewal is described by water and mug symbols.
story.mystic_message: Spiritually, the Ace of Hearts is a beginning for opening the heart, for access to inspiration and intuition, and with meditation and awareness, you can feel the energy of your heart.
story.cultural_title: Modern Comment: Emotional and Spiritual Regeneration
story.cultural_message: In the modern world, the Ace of Hearts represents fresh beginnings in new emotional connections, intimate relationships and spiritual awareness. Listen to internal guidance and express your feelings.
story.lesson: Open your heart, express your feelings, and allow new beginnings to enrich your life with love and empathy.

keywords.soul_message: Open your heart, release your emotions and embrace spiritual energy.

2.answer: New emotional experiences are powerful in situations that require love, intimate relationships and spiritual awareness.

two-of-cups.name: Two of Hearts (Bible) Links and Partnerships
two-of-cups.short_description: The Duo of Hearts represents relationships based on love, harmony, and mutual understanding, where the two souls come together, emotional bonds are strengthened, partnerships deepen.

upright.general: The Two of Hearts represents mutual trust, love, and harmony between two people, which shows that the balance, understanding and intimacy in relationships can be strengthened -- new partnerships, friendships, or romantic bonds.
upright.love: In love, harmony, mutual attraction, and emotional commitment are at the forefront, the relationship can be moved to a new level or a new romantic bond can begin.
upright.career: In careers, business partnerships, teamwork and collaborations are strengthened, joint goals and compatible relationships bring success.
upright.money: In financial matters, co-operation based on mutual investment or trust comes to the attention of financial balance.
upright.spiritual: Spiritually, the bond of the heart develops, compassion and empathy, representing strong ties with the Dual of Hearts, soul mates, or spiritual friends.

reversed.general: The Reverse Cup Duo means misunderstandings, miscommunications, or emotional imbalance, and relationships may need to be restored to balance and intimacy.
reversed.love: In love, the opposite position means separation, emotional distance, or imbalance, and it's important to strengthen communication.
reversed.career: In a career, there may be dissonance, misunderstanding, or lack of trust in partnership, and honesty and open communication solve the problem.
reversed.money: Financially, there may be loss of confidence or instability in co-operation.
reversed.spiritual: In a spiritual sense, there may be dissolution or loss of internal balance in emotional ties, so go back to your intuition and bond with your heart.

context.mythology: The Duo of Hearts is a symbol of unity and love, and in ancient mythology, it represents the sacred union of gods and heroes connected from the heart.

celtic_cross.future: In the future, a new partnership, a romantic relationship, or friendship awaits you.
celtic_cross.hidden_influences: It's caused by hidden effects, mutual understanding, trust, and open communication.

story.title: The Two of Hearts, the Union of Hearts
story.description: In the card, the two figures hold hands and share a cup with each other, with a lion's head and wings on them, showing that the union includes both power and sanctity. This card is a symbol of love and harmony.
story.history_message: The Duo of Hearts has been used as a symbol of marriage, friendship, and holy partnership since the Middle Ages. It is the card of loving unity in Tarot's history.
story.mystic_title: Spiritual Meaning - Union of the Heart
story.mystic_message: Spiritually, the Duo of Hearts teaches the combination of two souls, mutual understanding and unconditional love. This is the pure expression of unity energy.
story.cultural_message: In modern world, the Cup Duo represents mutual trust in romantic relationships, business partnerships, or friendships, and maintain balance and intimacy in relationships.
story.lesson: Connect, listen with empathy, and share with love, true unity comes from the heart.

three-of-cups.name: The Three of Hearts (Troys) (Celebrity and Unity)
three-of-cups.short_description: The Three of Hearts represents a time of celebration filled with love, friendship, and sharing, full of community, friendship, and unity.

upright.general: The Trinity of Hearts represents congratulatory relationships, friendship and harmony, a time when success, happiness and unity are shared, connecting with the community, celebrating common goals, and loving sharing.
upright.love: In love, a joyful union, emotional harmony, and happy relationships are at the forefront, and if you are single, a romantic opportunity may arise in your social environment.
upright.career: In the career, teamwork, success celebrations, and co-operation energy prevail. Projects bear fruit, success is shared.
upright.money: Financially, it shows a period in which profits are celebrated, shares are increased and co-operation gains.
upright.spiritual: Spiritually, community consciousness is meant to combine with sharing and positive energy, and with meditation groups or friendly environments, spiritual balance increases.

reversed.general: The Reverse Cup Trio refers to misunderstandings, tension in friendship, or excessive celebration, maintain emotional balance and maintain openness in relationships.
reversed.love: In reverse positions in love, triple dynamics, may show the energy of confusion or jealousy, and open and honest communication is important.
reversed.career: In a career, there may be incompatibility or lack of communication within the team, and the feeling that success is not shared can cause unrest.
reversed.money: Financially, excessive spending or uncontrollably entertainment can lead to imbalance.
reversed.spiritual: In a spiritual sense, it could be a sense of incompatibility or loss of inner balance, so get back to yourself and find inner peace.

context.mythology: In ancient mythology, the Trinity of Hearts is associated with the dance of goddesses and the symbol of holy brotherhood, representing friendship, feminine energy, and shared happiness.

celtic_cross.future: A future celebration, success, or a happy development in your social circle awaits you.
celtic_cross.hidden_influences: It's about hidden influences, friendship ties, community support and positive energy.

story.title: The Triplet of Hearts (The Dance of Joy)
story.description: On the card, three women dance with trophies in their hands, representing the energy of joy, celebration, and sharing, which is the triumph of the spirit of unity and community.
story.history_message: The Three of Hearts has been a symbol of the energy of friendship, unity and feminine celebration throughout history.
story.mystic_message: Spiritually, the Three of Hearts represents the consciousness of unity, the sharing of love, and the connection to the heart, the healing of being together with others.
story.cultural_message: In the modern world, the Three of Hearts means sharing social ties, friendships and achievements, creating joy together in the community, feeding the spirit.
story.lesson: Notice the power of celebration, sharing, and friendship, and the joy grows as it is shared.

keywords.keywords_message: The trio of hearts means tarot, three of cups, friendship, celebration, unity, community, happiness.
keywords.positive_message: Friendship, unity, happiness, celebration, sharing, success, love.
keywords.balance_message: Excessive entertainment or superficial bonds can cause instability.
keywords.soul_message: Share your joy, have a sense of friendship and community, and the spirit heals as you share it.

card_combinations.title: Combinations With the Three of Hearts

0.meaning: The energy of celebration and happiness reaches its peak; success brings great joy.

1.meaning: Wishes are celebrated with friends or in close proximity.

2.meaning: Reanimation of old friendships or a celebration of a bond from the past.

affirmation_list.0: I share my happiness and success with love.
affirmation_list.1: I am strengthening my environment with the energy of friendship and unity.
affirmation_list.2: Celebrating the beauty of life, sharing my joy.

cta.main: Share happiness, celebrate friendship, and grow joy!
cta.micro: Send a loving message to a friend today or have a little celebration.

0.question: What does the Three of Hearts represent?
0.answer: The Three of Hearts represents friendship, unity, celebration, and loving sharing.

1.question: What does the Reverse Cup Trio mean?
1.answer: The opposite position points to extreme celebration, communication problems or misunderstandings. It's important to maintain balance.

2.question: In what circumstances is the card strong?
2.answer: Success is powerful during social events, friendships and celebrations.

four-of-cups.name: The Four of Hearts ▪ Internal Thinking and Awareness
four-of-cups.short_description: The Four of Hearts represents the search for introverts, emotional stagnation and awareness, and it's time to listen to your heart again and find inner satisfaction.

upright.general: The Four of Hearts shows an emotional recession, a period of boredom or introvertion, and you can be emotionally closed without realizing the opportunities of life, which is the calling to open your heart and act with awareness.
upright.love: In love, there may be emotional separation, indifference, or dissatisfaction, a time to question the true needs of your heart.
upright.career: You may feel a lack of motivation or dissatisfaction in your career, so be open to new opportunities, because there might be an unexpected offer.
upright.money: Financially, your current situation may not be enough for you, but a new opportunity may be waiting to be noticed.
upright.spiritual: Mentally, you can feel emotional closure or inner emptiness, meditation and awareness work will bring you back to balance.

reversed.general: The Reverse Cup Four means increased awareness and the realization of new opportunities, and now you're ready to come out of your shell, emotionally reconnect.
reversed.love: In love, it's time to regain interest and energy, revitalize emotional ties, and a new relationship can come up.
reversed.career: In a career, realizing new opportunities means finding inspiration and taking action.
reversed.money: New sources of income and opportunities may arise in financial matters, so take your chances.
reversed.spiritual: It's a process of spiritual resuscitation and beginning to hear the direction of the heart.

context.mythology: The Four of Hearts is a symbol of meditation and awareness that represents the process of finding itself in silence in ancient mystical traditions.

celtic_cross.future: You may soon have an opportunity to awaken you, to revive you spiritually.
celtic_cross.hidden_influences: The hidden effects may be caused by not listening to your own inner voice or emotional closure.

story.title: The Four of Hearts (The Four) Answer in Silence
story.description: A figure sits under a tree, doesn't notice a fourth cup extended from the sky as he looks at the three mugs in front of him. This describes the lack of inner unrest and awareness. To see the gifts that life offers, you have to open your heart.
story.history_message: The Four of Hearts is associated with the search for spiritual space and meaning in medieval mystics. This card is a call to learn to notice again.
story.mystic_message: Spiritually, this card teaches you to find guidance in inner silence, to listen to your heart and recognize the beauty of the present moment.
story.cultural_title: Modern Comment: Awareness and Emotional Balance
story.cultural_message: When you feel lost at the speed of modern life, the Four of Hearts reminds you to stop, to take deep breaths, and to notice the little miracles that life offers.
story.lesson: Even in an emotional void, the universe may open new doors for you, open your heart and notice.

keywords.keywords_message: The four of hearts are tarot meaning, four of cups, awareness, emotional recession, introvertion, vision of opportunities.
keywords.positive_message: Consciousness, inner peace, resurrection, emotional balance.
